title: Short Narrative
description: Learn to tell short B1-entry stories with clear sequence.

steps.teacher: 昨天發生了一件有趣的事情。
expected_answer: 昨天發生了一件有趣的事情。
steps.pinyin: zuó tiān fā shēng le yí jiàn yǒu qù de shì qíng.
wǒ yuán běn dǎ suàn zǎo diǎn chū mén.

steps.teacher: 結果因為下雨，我只好改搭地鐵。
expected_answer: 結果因為下雨，我只好改搭地鐵。
steps.pinyin: jié guǒ yīn wèi xià yǔ, wǒ zhǐ hǎo gǎi dā dì tiě.
steps.english_hint: But because it rained, I took the subway instead.

steps.teacher: 在地鐵上，我遇到一位很久沒見的朋友。
expected_answer: 在地鐵上，我遇到一位很久沒見的朋友。
steps.pinyin: zài dì tiě shàng, wǒ yù dào yí wèi hěn jiǔ méi jiàn de péng yǒu.
steps.english_hint: On the subway, I met a long-lost friend.

steps.teacher: 我們簡單聊了一下近況。
expected_answer: 我們簡單聊了一下近況。
steps.pinyin: wǒ men jiǎn dān liáo le yí xià jìn kuàng.
steps.english_hint: We briefly talked about our recent lives.

steps.teacher: 他告訴我，他最近換了新工作。
expected_answer: 他告訴我，他最近換了新工作。
steps.pinyin: tā gào sù wǒ, tā zuì jìn huàn le xīn gōng zuò.
steps.english_hint: He told me he recently changed jobs.

steps.teacher: 我覺得這個巧遇非常特別。
expected_answer: 我覺得這個巧遇非常特別。
steps.pinyin: wǒ jué dé zhè gè qiǎo yù fēi cháng tè bié.
steps.english_hint: I felt this unexpected meeting was very special.

steps.teacher: 我們約好下次再找時間好好聊聊。
expected_answer: 我們約好下次再找時間好好聊聊。
steps.pinyin: wǒ men yuē hǎo xià cì zài zhǎo shí jiān hǎo hǎo liáo liáo.
steps.english_hint: We agreed to find time to chat again.

steps.teacher: 雖然只是短短幾分鐘，但讓我很開心。
expected_answer: 雖然只是短短幾分鐘，但讓我很開心。
steps.pinyin: suī rán zhǐ shì duǎn duǎn jǐ fēn zhōng, dàn ràng wǒ hěn kāi xīn.
steps.english_hint: Although it was just a few minutes, it made me happy.

steps.teacher: 所以我覺得，有時候小事也能帶來驚喜。
expected_answer: 所以我覺得，有時候小事也能帶來驚喜。
steps.pinyin: suǒ yǐ wǒ jué dé, yǒu shí hòu xiǎo shì yě néng dài lái jīng xǐ.
steps.english_hint: So I think sometimes small things can bring surprises.

review.summary: You practiced a complete B1-entry narrative structure.
